name: I can't draw, but I tried
name_original: I can't draw, but I tried
description:
"I can't draw, but I tried" is a short Visual Novel, which I tried to draw without any skill and not a lot of experience in producing music. What I ended up making is a comedy story with some dark tones and 5 different endings. A normal playthrough should take about 2 hours, while playing all the paths could take an extra hour. 

This game is more about the different characters than the actual story, so if you're into this, you should have a fun time playing! 

Name your character, sit back and enjoy the story and characters of "I can't draw, but I tried"!
(Available in english and german.)

Follow the game on Twitter for updates and other fun stuff:
@BakamiGame
